AK::IAkPluginParam
ALL_PLUGIN_DATA_ID
Clone
Init
SetParam
SetParamsBlock
Term
~IAkPluginParam
const AkPluginParamID AK::IAkPluginParam::ALL_PLUGIN_DATA_ID = 0x7FFF [static]

Use this constant with AK::Wwise::IPluginPropertySet::NotifyInternalDataChanged, AK::Wwise::IAudioPlugin::GetPluginData and IAkPluginParam::SetParam. This tells that the whole plugin data needs to be saved/transferred.

See also:
  • AK::Wwise::IPluginPropertySet::NotifyInternalDataChanged
  • AK::Wwise::IAudioPlugin::GetPluginData
  • AK::IAkPluginParam::SetParam
